sentences.en: Actually, that is not strictly true.
sentences.cn: 事实上，严格说来那不是真的。

sentences.en: Alcohol is strictly forbidden on school premises.
Although strictly illogical, Martin's interpretation of this paradox seems the best.
sentences.cn: 马丁对于这一悖论的解释尽管严格说来不合乎逻辑, 卻似乎是最好的解释了.

sentences.en: He seemed fond of her in a strictly professional way.
sentences.cn: 他似乎只是出于职业缘故而喜欢她。

sentences.en: He showed little initiative, handling all matters strictly by the book.
sentences.cn: 他缺乏首创精神, 墨守成规地办一切事情.

sentences.en: It is strictly forbidden to obtain confessions and to give them credence.
My own mother was brought up very strictly and correctly.
sentences.cn: 我母亲从小接受严格而规范的教育。

sentences.en: Now my role is strictly advisory.
sentences.cn: 现在我的角色仅限于顾问。

sentences.en: Photography is strictly forbidden in the museum.
Products must be strictly, not carelessly, inspected before they leave the factory.
sentences.cn: 产品出厂要严格检查, 马马虎虎可不行.
奎因所交往的人都是最有名气的。

sentences.en: She was brought up very strictly.
Sikhs were expected to adhere strictly to the religious rules concerning appearance.
sentences.cn: 锡克教徒应当严格遵守该教对外表的规定。

sentences.en: The acceptance of new members is strictly controlled.
sentences.cn: 新成员的吸纳受到严格的限制。

sentences.en: The ban on hunting is not strictly enforced .
sentences.cn: 狩猎禁令并未严格执行。

sentences.en: The guests were seated strictly in order of precedence.
sentences.cn: 客人严格按照地位高低就座.

sentences.en: The President told the reporters his remarks were strictly off the record.
sentences.cn: 总统告诉记者们他的谈话不得公开发表.
